item.title: CSR News: Kriya Program Expanded to 12 government schools in Raichur
item.description: <![CDATA[In a move to enhance science education in rural India, Prayoga Institute of Education Research has announced a partnership with the State Bank of India Foundation (SBIF), the corporate social responsibility (CSR) arm of India’s largest public sector bank, and the SBI Funds Management Pvt. Ltd to expand the Kriya initiative across 12 government schools in Raichur, Karnataka. Now in its 10th year, Prayoga continues to advance research-driven solutions to strengthen science education across India. ...]]>
item.author: The Csr Journal, Published -

item.title: 12 government schools in Karnataka's Raichur to get high-tech science labs
item.description:
<![CDATA[In a move to enhance science education in rural India, 12 government schools in Raichur district in Karnataka will be provided with well-stocked science lab stations to conduct experiments and curated science courseware aligned with the state and National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) syllabi.
This is part of Prayoga Institute of Education Research's Kriya initiative, which aims to transform science learning for over 11,000 students across 77 schools in Karnataka.
advert...]]>

item.title: Lorry rams two-wheeler in Raichur’s Manvi, biker dies on spot
item.description:
<![CDATA[In phone call, Xi and Putin 'strongly condemn' Israeli strikes on Iran; call for immediate ceasefire 19-06-2025 ¦ 19-06-2025 IST
19-06-2025 ¦ 19-06-2025 IST
Chinese President Xi Jinping and his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin | PC: AFP
Beijing/Moscow, Jun 19 (PTI): Chinese President Xi Jinping and his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin on Thursday strongly condemned Israeli strikes on Iran and called for an immediate ceasefire, "especially" by Israel, and an end to attacks on civilians. ...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi

item.description: <![CDATA[A CSR initiative is expanding hands-on science education in 12 government schools in Raichur, Karnataka. The initiative introduces well-equipped labs, curated courseware, and continuous teacher mentoring. Targeting students in grades 6 to 10, it aims to foster curiosity, critical thinking, and experiential learning, supporting educational development in an aspirational district....]]>
